All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Battlefield
Holds all information pertaining a single battle.
BattleFieldView
Displays the Battlefield.
Enemy
Is used for the Opponent of the Player
FightingEntitiesService_Develop
Creation of Heroes for Develop purposes.
FightingEntity
Base Class for all Fighting Entities in the Game.
FightingEntity.Type
 
FightingEntityAI
 
FightingEntityDisplayer
A JPanel which displays a FightingEntity.
GameController
Starting point of the Game.
Hero
Used for the Playable Characters in the Game.
ICustomEventInterface
 
IFightingEntitiesService
Delivers access to all functions for Fighting Entities, which create, come or go outside this Programm.
IFightingEntityActionInterface
 
ServiceFactory
Provides Access to abstracted Services for creation, get from outside, save to outside functions.
SpriteActionListener
ActionListener used to Update / Reset Sprite-Animation
SpriteEngine
Manages when the Sprite in the UI is updated.
SpriteMetaDataGenerator
Can be used to access the Metadata to the sprites for a Fighting Entity.
SpriteSheet
Manages different Sprites in a Spritesheet.
SpriteSheet.Range
 
SpriteSheet.State
 
SpriteSheetBuilder
Builder for SpriteSheets.
Test2View
Used to test Changes before implementing them in the BattleGroundView
TestDisplayer
Used for Tests in TestView / Test2View Duplicates FightingEntityDisplayer.

Used to test Changes before implementing them in the BattleGroundView
